comment:
Extracted Variables:
- Let x be the number of full time workers
- Let y be the number of part time workers

Definitions:
- x: Number of full time workers to be scheduled
- y: Number of part time workers to be scheduled

Constraints:
- 8x + 4y \geq 500 (Total hours of labor required)
- 300x + 100y \leq 15000 (Budget constraint)
- x, y \geq 0 (Non-negativity constraint)

Objective:
- Minimize z = x + y (Minimize the total number of workers scheduled)
